entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
